version_description: Fixed a display alignment bug when the app cannot connect to the internet and you aren't logged in yet.

-- Fix links to external apps
-- Can now insert the cursor into tags while in edit mode
-- When only one page is starred, we will now take you directly there when clicking 'star' in the bottom bar
Fixed a display alignment bug when the app cannot connect to the internet and you aren't logged in yet.

Welcome to WorkFlowy Mobile 2.0! We have completely redesigned the interface and added some powerful new features.

HIGHLIGHTS
-- Visual refresh gives the app a modern feel
-- The blue '+' button allows you to easily add new items to the top of the current list
-- The 'Star' menu lets you bookmark lists for easy access. There is also a small '+' button next to each starred item which lets you "quick add" to any of your starred lists
-- You can undo or redo changes using buttons under the '...' menu.
-- You can now swipe any item from left to right to mark it completed
-- Edit controls have moved above the keyboard for improved one-hand usage
-- 'Home' and 'Back' buttons
-- Fixed dozens of longstanding bugs

-- Fix a javascript error on the login page
-- Update screenshots to reflect the current interface
-- Make the bottom area gray to match menu bar on iPhone X instead of white
-- Scroll text properly when you are in edit mode to keep it above the keyboard
-- Fix search so it doesn't randomly clear after a few seconds

-- The Starred and '...' menus can now be swiped down to close them
-- Sped up menu animations for a snappier feel

-- Fix links to external apps
-- Can now insert the cursor into tags while in edit mode
-- When only one page is starred, we will now take you directly there when clicking 'star' in the bottom bar

-- You can now make the text bigger or smaller using a slider. Open the '...' menu in the lower right corner and choose 'Adjust Text Size".
-- Swipe from right to left to delete an item
-- Updated Icons
-- Updated color scheme

-- Improved startup load time for large accounts
-- Fixed bug where tags could not be clicked when in edit mode

-- Improved startup load time for large accounts
-- Fixed bug where tags could not be clicked when in edit mode
Minor bug fixes

-- Fix a bug where users had to log in over and over again
-- Remove the 'Reload' button from the '...' menu

** Fixed crash on iOS 9.3.5 **
-- Fixed several bugs with moving items
Fix another crash on ios 9
Fix keyboard controls on custom keyboards (e.g Gboard)
Fix the indent/outdent control bar for bluetooth keyboards
Minor bug fixes
-- Fix indent button not showing up after splitting the first item with a return
Fix loading on iOS 9
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Fix bug where upgrade was showing stale data (what could be fixed by logging out and logging in)

- Fix issue where login fails even when connected to internet
- Fix page margins on iPad in landscape mode
Fixes a bug where some people were stuck on the loading screen

- Font size adjustment screen now has bigger buttons that are easier to click
- Fix some issues with the app not loading
- Bigger and clearer buttons for the font size settings

- You can now drag one item under another item that is not expanded
- You can now drag an item under another item that has no children
- Fix bug where sign out button was missing from Settings
- Fix expanding the last item
Fixes a bug where moving the top item in a list, if it is expanded, would break things.

- When moving items, indentation is now handled by the left or right position of your finger
- Fix longstanding bug: You can now remove underline formatting from text that has it
- WorkFlowy links now open using the app by default
Minor bug fixes

-Fix so long notes stay open making it easier to read them
-Fix bug where toolbar was not showing consistently
-Fixed bug where clicking on tags was not bringing up search
Minor bug fixes

- When moving items, indentation is now handled by the left or right position of your finger
- Fix longstanding bug: You can now remove underline formatting from text that has it
- WorkFlowy links now open using the app by default
Minor bug fixes
- Fix registration page
- Fixed bug where the top of the next line was displayed when a note was collapsed
Minor bug fixes
Fix bug where search box would appear randomly
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

- "Typewriter" font now uses Menlo (Typewriter and Terminal are no longer the same font)
- Font size of notes for the current item now scale correctly with font size setting
- In dark mode, keyboard and accessory bar are now dark as well

- Fixed bug where keyboard wouldn't stay up on iPhone SE in landscape mode
- Fixed bug where starred items would disappear when launching the app offline
- Added a banner to indicate when app is offline and not syncing changes

- Updated loading screen
- Fixed app hanging occasionally after 100 zooms or 100 edits
- Fixed star button showing twice
- Improved dark mode colors
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

- Swipe from right to left on an item to bring up a menu that allows new "Duplicate" and "Share" actions for that item.
- Delete now takes an extra click for security

- Fixed tab key on external keyboards with iOS 12.2
- Fixed bug where sharing from iOS 12.2 would sometimes make WorkFlowy crash
- Fixed bug where non-ASCII (international) characters were pasting incorrectly when copying from Share Content
Minor bug fixes

- Tags (#) and Mentions (@) now show autocomplete options
- New # and @ buttons in the keyboard menu to enter a tag or mention
- The login email field now uses an email-friendly keyboard layout
- Fixed bug with left/right swipe where multiple swipes in a row would stomp on each other
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
-Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

Fixes a bug that prevented large accounts from loading
Fixes a handful of minor bugs
Fixes an additional startup bug in iOS 10
Fixes a bug where moving the top item in a list, if it is expanded, would break things.

3.4.5 Fixes a bunch of issues in iOS 13:
-- Can't delete nodes by tapping backspace
-- Accidentally entering into note mode
-- Autocapitalization broken

New stuff!
-- left bar for easier navigation and quickly adding to any list
-- add and search for dates (experimental feature, turn on in settings)
-- search helper for dates and advanced searches
-- Fixes for a few visual display bugs
Fixes a bug where swiping right to complete would break and you'd be stuck with green bars on the page

1) Bugfix: People should no longer sometimes see a frozen orange screen after switching back to workflowy when multi-tasking.
2) Stability: iOS 12 and 13 have a storage bug in a system we rely on (IndexedDb) that can sometimes lead to minor data loss. We have built a new solution on top of a more stable part of iOS. There is an opt-in button in settings which you can use to start using this new storage system.

-- Improve speed of search
-- Fix issue with new iOS offline data storage system
Bug fixes & improvements
Bug fixes & improvements
Bug fixes & small improvements
Bug fixes & small improvements

Fixes:

* Rolled back the auto-creation of a child bullet when zooming into an empty bullet.
Bug fixes & improvements
Bug fixes & improvements
Bug fixes & improvements
Bug fixes & improvements
Bug fixes & improvements
Bug fixes & improvements

A new interface addressing many of the core interaction issues and making the whole application feel much more native.

Also, fixes a bug that broke offline functionality in the last release.
